channel.title: Uhh help with MySQL?

item.title: Uhh help with MySQL?
item.dc:creator: @Stanyer Stanyer
item.description:
@Stanyer wrote:

I have this but obviously not working, new to MySQL in Java.

public static void getPlayerRights(client clientToSave) {
try {
query("SELECT playerRights FROM players WHERE playerName = '"+clientToSave.playerName+"'");
SetRights = playerRights;
} catch (Exception e) {
e.printStackTrace();
}
}

How would i return the value of the row playerRights?

Read full topic
